column2: the food was pretty delicious. :) We
column4: ordered the bacon wrapped dates and the queso de cabra al horno (goat cheese was amazing!) among many! Since we checked in with Yelp
column5: we got a free Pintxo Platter
column6: which was also quite delicious! Although the food was yummy
column7: I feel I have had better tapas and their menu selection was fairly standard
column8: without surprising twists and turns. But
column9: the food was quite yummy for my tummy!
